name: melted bloodrune stone
description: Finely crushed and extremely heated bloodrune stone. It merely generates a faint glow, but the most important, the power still possessed in its liquid phase.

name: bloodrune stone
description: A pleasant, red colored stone that looks like a pure, solidified vampire blood. Its core imitates a heartbeat with unreadable marks appearing again and again from its outside layer. The strange power seems to be used with certain crafts.

name: large bloodrune stone
description: A large bloodrune stone. Too big for usual crafts and requires breaking into pieces with a proper tool to be usable.

name: sticky blood
description: A sticky, rounded human blood, as literally. Its clarity red seems clean enough to look throught it while stretchy and the original form remains.

name: blood powder
description: A powdered human blood. Perfect vampire getaway snacks.

name: blood extract
description: A sticky sap after the process of extraction from the blood.

name: blood compact sheet
description: Well compressed leathery sheet. It is known as an aesthetical clothing material, due to reddish appearance. But from now, its proven superior to armorcraft.

name: blood
description: Blood, possibly that of a human.  Disgusting!
